entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to update runtime ids using runtimeGroups.props #57702
    untriaged
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    tenet-performance, untriaged, runtime-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Bug report] gdi+ render bugs on unix platform #57694
    area-System.Drawing, Future
  • [mono][aot] `.aotdata` files size increase compared to _legacy_ mono #57689
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Impossible signature padding conditions in RSAAndroid #57683
    area-System.Security, os-android, 6.0.0
  • AppModel docs and cleanup for 6.0 #57682
    area-Single-File, linkable-framework, 6.0.0
  • ETW callstacks from .NET provider contain impossible recursive frames #57675
    untriaged
  • OpenSSL 3.0 has removed `ERR_GET_FUNC` #57674
    area-System.Security, blocking-release, os-linux, 6.0.0
  • HelloiOS failing on CI with exit code 1 #57666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57664
    untriaged, in pr
  • Remove code guarded by FEATURE_PREJIT #57660
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Remove code guarded by CROSSGEN_COMPILE #57657
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    tenet-performance, untriaged
  • [Perf] SoD Regressions in dotnet.wasm and Aggregate .wasm for New Blazor Template and Pizza App #57654
    tenet-performance, tenet-performance-benchmarks, untriaged
  • Question: Limits of loaded assemblies #57652
    question, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget() does not write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57649
    area-DependencyModel, untriaged
  • [HTTP/3] New case of "The server returned an invalid or unrecognized response" #57647
    area-System.Net.Http, tracking-external-issue, untriaged
  • Missing .yml dependency in Mono llvmaot Pri0 Runtime Tests job #57645
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • HttpClient should allow schemes to be restricted (for AllowAutoRedirect) #57644
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • [hot_reload] Calling a method for the first time after an update crashes the app #57643
    area-EnC-mono, 6.0.0
  • Support Svg class or ISvg interface #57679
    untriaged
  • BadImageFormatException when trying to load c++/cli .net 5 assembly into c# .net 5 project #57642
    needs more info, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Mono] Split QCall table declarations from their implementations #57639
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • /tmp not writable on tvOS device, breaking Path.GetTempPath #57638
    area-System.IO, blocking-release, os-tvos, in pr, 6.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets:4.3.0 Unable to resolve CVE-2019-1301 Vulnerability #57632
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • macOS (Xamarin): failure to build X509Chain #57630
    area-System.Security, untriaged
  • Every minor version of .NET 5 exist at the same time #57629
    area-Setup, untriaged
  • [WinHttpHandler] Test failed: ReadAsStreamAsync_StreamCanReadIsFalseAfterDispose #57626
    area-System.Net.Http, test-run-core, Future
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashWorkerThreads/ParallelCrashWorkerThreads.sh #57621
    os-mac-os-x, arch-x64, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, untriaged
  • [HTTP/3] Http3RequestStream.BufferFrameEnvelope null reference error #57619
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • MSVC's C++23 `<stdatomic.h>` breaks the CoreCLR build #57618
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, untriaged
  • [HTTP/2] Race between reading response and reset? #57617
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged

Closed

  • Remove code guarded by FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER (outside of the coreclr/jit directory. It is still used there) #57659
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest frequent failures #49700
    area-System.Threading, disabled-test, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0
  • ThreadPoolBoundHandleTests.MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest timed out #47979
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Testing composite R2R images with containers #54441
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Segmentation fault #57611
    area-Snap, untriaged
  • Remove code guarded by FEATURE_NGEN_RELOCS_OPTIMIZATIONS #57661
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid negated result #57640
    blocking-release, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT crash/assert while compiling Grpc.core codebase #57535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Remove code guarded by FEATURE_NATIVE_IMAGE_GENERATION #57658
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • All inherited interface members should be implemented on an interface marked with DynamicInterfaceCastableImplementationAttribute #41529
    api-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, code-analyzer, code-fixer, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • TryAddEnumerable fails with service descriptors created with constructor and imlementation factory #56105
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, Future
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.sh #57620
    os-linux, arch-x64, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JSON source generator misses JsonSerializerContext in root namespace #57663
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • Question: on macOS, what's the possible reasons for "Interop+AppleCrypto+AppleCommonCryptoCryptographicException : The user name or passphrase you entered is not correct." #56929
    question, area-System.Security, Future
  • Critical Authorization Failure with Claim handling #55732
    area-System.Security, untriaged
  • System.Security.Cryptography AES Decryption returns wrong results in latest builds #55527
    area-System.Security, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.0
  • DPAPI Unprotect CryptographicException: The operation completed successfully #52537
    area-System.Security, needs further triage, 6.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b311420/b311420/b311420.sh #57622
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-crossgen2-coreclr, untriaged
  • Proposal: Unsafe APIs to support ref void* and ref T* #44968
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow the user to explicitly choose the algorithm used by System.Random #57624
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • ILVerify: bug in verification of InitOnly fields #55033
    up-for-grabs, area-ILVerification, Future
  • System.Threading - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54866
    documentation, area-System.Threading.Tasks, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Server sometimes doesn't receive notification of the end of request stream #57608
    area-System.Net, untriaged

Updated

  • System.Net.Security test run killed on Mono Linux #56478
    area-System.Net.Security, test-run-core, untriaged, runtime-mono
  • Assertion failed: OpenSsl error queue is not empty #57722
    area-System.Net.Security, test-run-core, untriaged

    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 7.0.0

    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • iOS: building with LLVM causes some exception catch clauses to not work #56100
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, os-ios, 6.0.0

    untriaged

    api-suggestion, area-System.Reflection, needs more info, Future
